subject: SR. SOFTWARE QA ENGINEER (SQA5)  E2Open  Redwood City, CA
msgSnippet: SR. SOFTWARE QA ENGINEER (SQA5) – E2Open – Redwood City, CA Here we go again.  E2Open is expanding.  Hello, my name is Paul Stevens and I am a staffing
messageBody:
SR. SOFTWARE QA ENGINEER (SQA5)  E2Open  Redwood City, CA

Here we go again. E2Open is expanding. Hello, my name is Paul
Stevens and I am a staffing consultant with a software company based
in Redwood City, CA called E2open (www.e2open.com). We currently
have openings for 3 Senior Quality Assurance Developers with strong
Java, QA, Unix (Solaris) and XML experience. For these positions we
need automation experience using Java and shell scripting and
experience in frameworks like JUNIT. We are not seeking expertise in
UI automation test tools like SILK and Mercury Interactive. If that
is your background, let's save each other some time. We are
searching for an accomplished software developer with a strong
background in Java Development (Unix Platform) who straddles the
line between QA and Development, who understands QA methodology,
whose expertise is in analyzing and testing components, who is
secure in a QA role and who understands the importance that a strong
QA perspective brings to the development process. Expertise in
developing supply chain software and RosettaNet would be a big plus.

When responding to this posting, please include your name and the
letters SQA5 in the subject line. Email your resume to
qacareers@....

Primary Responsibilities:

 Writing and evaluating test plans, developing and running
performance measurement tests and working with other test and
development teams.
 Working closely in a team atmosphere with engineers from
product development and quality assurance to create Automated,
functional, load/performance and system tests.

Job Qualifications:

 Two years experience in a Quality Assurance department with
at least 1 year QA test automation development experience using
JAVA, JUNIT, EJB and XML.
 Two years experience in design, development, QA, or
integration of Supply Chain enterprise resource planning (ERP)
software.
 Experience programming in a Unix environment.
 Experience working with Oracle, HTML and SQL
 Bachelor's degree in CS, Engineering, or other closely
related technical field required

ABOUT E2OPEN:

E2open (www.e2open.com) is the global collaboration network for the
electronics industry. E2open enables effective collaboration among
OEMs, contract manufacturers, distributors and suppliers and
supports the entire product lifecycle, including design,
manufacturing, procurement and asset recovery for computing,
networking and consumer electronics products. E2open was formed by
industry leaders Acer, Hitachi, IBM, LG Electronics, Lucent
Technologies, Matsushita Electric (Panasonic), Nortel Networks,
Seagate Technology, Solectron and Toshiba, as well as the prominent
investors Crosspoint Venture Partners and Morgan Stanley Dean
Witter. E2open Strategic Members include Mitsubishi Electric,
Omron, Ricoh, Sanyo and Sharp.

IMPORTANT MESSAGE:

Thank you for taking the time to review the above job requirements.
If your background matches the experience listed, I would very much
like to hear from you. If not, please take a moment to reflect upon
who in your circle of friends or co-workers might benefit from this
opportunity. Then pass this message along. Your selfless act may
propel them to a career of a lifetime.

No entry level or contract positions are available at this time.
Interested local candidates (no relocation offered) should forward a
cover letter and resume in any of the following formats - .DOC
(preferred), plain text, RTF, HTML, or PDF to qacareers@....


Please understand that due to the large volume of responses, I will
not be able to acknowledge each of you individually. Be assured,
however, that I will thoroughly examine each resume received and
will arrange interviews with the best qualified candidates. In
order to manage this process timely and efficiently, I will not be
able to respond to telephone inquiries or provide you with status
updates. Although I gratefully acknowledge my agency friends'
willingness to assist me, I am unable to accept resumes/profiles
from any 3rd parties (recruiters, agencies, contract firms, search
firms, etc.), at this time. Thanks again for considering e2open and
I look forward to early response.

CONTACT INFO:

Paul Stevens
Sr. Staffing Consultant
E2Open
1600 Seaport Blvd.
Redwood City, CA 94063
qacareers@...
www.e2open.com
